enhanced_posts.text:
#Albanese reportedly is scared of meeting face to face with #Trump in the White House.

Well, whatever potential confrontation Albo is running away from with Trump would be child's play compared to the rage he can expect from #Netanyahu if he gets the call from him he wants. 

He surely knows that.

enhanced_posts.text:
www.commondreams.org/opinion/why-...

Convicted sex trafficker Ghislaine Maxwell met with the DOJ’s #2 in July. Days later, she was moved from a violent Florida lockup to a comfier Texas camp. Funny how good behavior—and the right connections—can smooth out even a 20-year sentence.

#trump #epstein
